title: BONUS: BobbyCast #71 - Tom Douglas - Wrote "The House That Built Me" and more
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast #71 - Tom Douglas - Wrote "The House That Built Me" and more
description:
This is a bonus episode of the BobbyCast. A show that Bobby does from his house! 

Songwriter Tom Douglas stops by the BobbyCast. He tells the story behind writing "The House That Built Me", multiple songs for Tim McGraw and his theories on how to approach writing a song. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
